solution_line_template: Jamie has had {total_drank_initial} ounces because {ounces_from_milk_cup} plus {ounces_from_grape_juice_pint} equals <<{ounces_from_milk_cup}+{ounces_from_grape_juice_pint}={total_drank_initial}>>{total_drank_initial}.

She can drink {remaining_drinkable} ounces because {max_liquid_before_bathroom} - {total_drank_initial} equals <<{max_liquid_before_bathroom}-{total_drank_initial}={remaining_drinkable}>>{remaining_drinkable}.
